Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-27282 affecting package ruby for versions less than 3.1.4-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-27282 affecting package ruby for versions less than 3.1.4-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package ruby is earlier than 3.1.4-5, affected by CVE-2024-27282
